item.title: Php curl 设置 Proxy
item.description:
业务需要， 经常要去google 采集一些图片。 同一个ip经常被封。 所以配置百来个代理ip用来随机。

<?php

//随机一个代理
function get_proxy_info($filename) {
    $ips = file($filename);

    shuffle($ips);
    $proxy = array_pop($ips);

    return explode(':', $proxy, 3);
}

$url = 'http://ipinfo.io/';
$proxy = get_proxy_info('ip.txt');
list($ip, $port, $userpwd,) = $proxy;

$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CONNECTTIMEOUT, 10);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, false);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER, false);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYHOST, false);

curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_PROXYAUTH, CURLAUTH_BASIC);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_PROXYTYPE, CURLPROXY_HTTP);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_PROXY, $ip);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_PROXYPORT, $port);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_PROXYUSERPWD, trim($userpwd));

$result = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);

echo $result;

item.title: wordpress xmlrpc
item.description:
Wordpress xmlrpc 实际上也是用了IXR 类库。wp_xmlrpc_server 继承了IXR_Server。 业务逻辑基本上在 wp_xmlrpc_server 上。

<?php
//简单远程发布文章例子
include 'IXR_Library.php';

$url = 'http://www.wp.dev/xmlrpc.php';
$blog_id = 1;
$username = 'admin';
$password = 'admin';


$data = array(
    'post_type' => 'post',
    'post_content' => 'hello, world',
    'post_title' => 'hello!!'
);

$params = array($blog_id, $username, $password, $data);


$client = new IXR_Client($url);

$client->query('wp.newPost', $params);
//$client->query('demo.sayHello');
$r = $client->getResponse();

print_r($r);

item.title: 更简单的多维数组转码方式
item.description:
最近在开发一个采集工具。数据要保存到csv。要把多维数组的utf8数据转为gbk , 第一反应是用递归去转码。后来想想var_export 可以返回一个变量的字符串 。那样就可以直接转码！

<?php

class Csv {
    public static function put($filename, $fields) {

        eval('$fields = ' . iconv("UTF-8", "GBK" . '//IGNORE', var_export($fields, TRUE)) . ';');
        $fp = fopen($filename, 'a') or die("Can't open {$filename} \n");
        while (1) {
            if (flock($fp, LOCK_EX)) {
                fputcsv($fp, $fields);
                flock($fp, LOCK_UN);
                break;
            } else {
                sleep(1);
            }
        }
        fclose($fp);
    }
}
